text: is a river in Aomori Prefecture, Japan. It begins in the northern Hakkōda Mountains and flows into Aomori Bay at Aomori. It has a length of and is designated as a Class B river.https://www.pref.aomori.lg.jp/kotsu/build/komagomekawa-gaiyo.html ==References== == External links == * Rivers Division of Aomori Prefectural Government (in Japanese) Category:Rivers of Aomori Prefecture
title: Komagome River
